headline: Illinois American Water Announces 2025 "Water Keeps Life Flowing" Art Contest
summary: BELLEVILLE, Ill., September 16, 2025--Illinois American Water invites students to submit artwork to the company’s "Water Keeps Life Flowing" art contest — due by Friday, Oct. 24, 2025.

headline: Is American Water Works Stock Underperforming the S&P 500?
summary: American Water Works has significantly underperformed the S&P 500 over the past year, and analysts remain cautious about the stock’s prospects.
